SEED!!!! I had this game when i was about 6-8 years old and i lost it. I want it back, but with 10 kb/s its a litttttttttttttttttle slow...
EDIT to my last: its 1.5 kb/s...

I downloaded and burnt the iso only to a cd with PowerISO at 10x. Then got a serial number from one of the many online sources. It installs and works perfectly! I chose not to use the key generator, that way there is no possibility of a conflict with other software (like punkbuster). It recognizes the disc in the drive like it should. I visited the online community, and yes they are trying to get new players interested and involved. Thank you WinstonSmith6079 for a great upload. Once I get good at the game you may hear from me. Cheers!

winston ive done this with bout 5 different torrents n all have failed cna u give me the correct way to do it with urs plz any help would be great

No Trojans and no virus!

For installation is needed (just google):
1. a key or a key generator (included)
2. the latest patch (included but also available at http://ftp.sierra.com/sierra/homeworld)
3. a NoCD version of the ?exe? (not needed in this specific case)
4. a virtual CD driver software like ?DAEMON Tools?
5. a trainer and a strategy guide could help

See the HW Cataclysm example at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4269466/Homeworld_collection , and do the same for HW1 and HW2.

See also the other comments with help.

Play and have fun!
